translations: 勘误表；正误表（erratum 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Read the errata for the version you plan to install.
sentences.translation: 参阅您计划安装版本的勘误表。

sentences.sentence: This article will cover XML namespaces 1.0 (including all errata).
sentences.translation: 本文将介绍XML namespaces 1.0(包括所有的勘误表)。

sentences.sentence: Readers are requested to make the corrections pointed out in the errata.
sentences.translation: 要求读者根据勘误表匡正。
